name: Epic.Arctic_Mastery
display_help: You have Mastery over Ice and snow to blast your foes and control your foes.

powers.name: Epic.Arctic_Mastery.Chilblain
powers.display_help: Immobilizes your target in an icy trap. Deals some damage over time and slightly Slows the target's attack and movement speed. Useful for keeping villains at bay. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 5 ticks of 8.90 cold damage over 9.2s on target

powers.name: Epic.Arctic_Mastery.Block_of_Ice
powers.display_help: You can freeze a single foe in a Block of Ice. The target is frozen solid, helpless, and can be attacked. More powerful foes may not be held, but all affected targets will be Slowed. Recharge: Slow

display_info: -24.00% strength to jump height for 18s on target

powers.name: Epic.Arctic_Mastery.Ice_Blast
powers.display_help: Ice Blast hurls shards of ice at foes and Slows their attacks and movement for a time. Slower recharge than Ice Bolt, but more damage. You must be level 41 and have Chilblain or Block of Ice before selecting this power. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

powers.name: Epic.Arctic_Mastery.Shiver
powers.display_help: You can blast forth a wide cone of chilling air that dramatically Slows the movement and attack rate of nearby foes. You must be level 41 and have Chilblain or Block of Ice before selecting this power. Recharge: Slow

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 60 ft. radius 135° arc (10 targets max)

powers.name: Epic.Arctic_Mastery.Ice_Storm
powers.display_help: Shred your foes with this Ice Storm. This power deals a lot of damage in a large area and can Slow all affected targets movement and attack speed. You must be level 44 and have two other Arctic Mastery Powers before selecting this power. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Long
